name: Survival.iS
description:
You awaken on an Island with a task to power the Crystal. Can you accomplish this task before zombies eat you?

Fight, Explore, craft, and protect the crystal.

This game was made in two days, and I left a lot of room for improvement. I will update this game regularly if anyone has any suggestions. Please let me know.

P.S This is also my very first RMMZ game.

Credit

  • VisuStella Team
  • phoenix kagedesu
  • DKPlugins

SYSTEMS

  • ABS
  • DAY/NIGHT
  • WEATHER
  • EXPLORATION
  • VISUAL EQUIPMENT
  • +MORE TO COME

Watch me make the game!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjzqi-Uj6saXStpu2tX5IadLYCa8lsl45
